name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned AI Engineer with 8+ years of software engineering experience, I excel in developing LLM production solutions and integrating data pipelines to optimize performance and scalability. Proficient in **Python** alongside **TypeScript**, I specialize in building robust **APIs** and leveraging **React** for dynamic user interfaces. My technical expertise encompasses **cloud services** such as **AWS**, with a strong foundation in **distributed systems** and **orchestration frameworks**. I am well-versed in utilizing **vector databases**, **embeddings**, **OCR**, and **image processing** techniques that drive innovative solutions in the AI domain. Additionally, I have a proven ability to design and implement high-performance applications for the e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors, ensuring that they are both secure and efficient by leveraging industry best practices.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and deployed scalable **Python** applications and **APIs** to support **LLM Production** within a secure healthcare environment, ensuring compliance with regulations such as HIPAA and GDPR.
• Designed data pipelines for processing and orchestrating workflows using **AWS** services, enhancing data flow and management across distributed systems.
• Integrated **Vector databases** for efficient retrieval and storage of embeddings, improving the overall performance of AI systems.
• Created real-time processing frameworks leveraging **OCR** and **image processing** techniques within a **Python** ecosystem, streamlining data ingestion and transformation.
• Collaborated in building user interfaces with **React** and **TypeScript**, enhancing the user experience for healthcare applications.
• Architected and managed **data pipelines** utilizing orchestration frameworks such as **Apache Airflow** to ensure seamless data workflow processes.
• Implemented monitoring solutions for AI systems using observability tools, resulting in precise performance tuning and proactive issue resolution.
• Led a cross-functional team through the development of cloud-native AI solutions, mentoring peers in **Python** and teaching best practices related to AI and machine learning deployment.
• Optimized application performance by implementing **CI/CD pipelines** with tools like GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps for automated testing and deployments.
• Ensured high availability and scalability of applications by leveraging **AWS** services and Kubernetes for container orchestration.
• Conducted performance and stress testing of AI applications using frameworks like Apache JMeter to ensure system resilience and responsiveness.
• Guided the implementation of security best practices in AI applications, adhering to compliance standards such as SOC 2 and ISO 27001.
• Spearheaded innovative solutions through research and integration of **embeddings** for enhanced data analysis and machine learning capabilities.

- Developed and deployed **LLM production** models leveraging **Python**, optimizing data pipelines for enhanced performance and accuracy.
- Designed and implemented **APIs** and integrations using **TypeScript** and **Python**, facilitating seamless connection between AI services and frontend applications.
- Integrated **OCR** and **image processing** technologies into applications, enhancing the response and data extraction capabilities in **Python**.
- Built dynamic and responsive user interfaces using **React**, ensuring optimal performance while interacting with **APIs** and **distributed systems**.
- Orchestrated data pipelines utilizing cloud resources (**AWS**) to preprocess and manage data for machine learning applications.
- Developed real-time monitoring dashboards for AI performance metrics, showcasing data through **Python** and visualization tools.
- Implemented **vector databases** for efficient storage and retrieval of embeddings, improving the processing of AI models.
- Ensured compliance with data protection regulations in AI models by integrating secure practices and auditing with **Python**.
- Managed orchestration frameworks for distributed systems, optimizing resource allocation and scaling of AI services.
- Contributed to the framework of generative models through continuous integration and testing (CI/CD) practices, ensuring robust deployment and maintenance.
- Collaborated on the evolution of **cloud (AWS)**-based AI solutions, enhancing scalability and resource management.
- Successfully enhanced performance benchmarks by utilizing embeddings strategies in model training, resulting in improved response times by **30%**.
- Engaged in cross-functional teams to integrate cutting-edge AI features into existing infrastructures, promoting growth and efficiency within the organization.

• Developed and deployed scalable **Python** solutions to support **LLM Production** initiatives, leveraging frameworks and libraries like **FastAPI** and **Django** to build high-performance applications.
• Designed and implemented robust APIs in **Python** to facilitate seamless integration between various systems, improving transaction handling and data flow within **AI** projects.
• Utilized **TypeScript** and **React** to create dynamic, user-friendly interfaces for AI-powered applications, enhancing user interaction and experience across web platforms.
• Engineered **data pipelines** that process large volumes of data, incorporating advanced techniques such as **embeddings** and **OCR** for data enrichment and analysis.
• Integrated and managed **vector databases** to enable efficient storage and retrieval of embeddings, supporting machine learning capabilities in production environments.
• Streamlined orchestration of microservices by employing orchestration frameworks, ensuring high availability and scalability in **distributed systems**.
• Conducted image processing tasks with **Python** libraries, enhancing data analysis and representation, crucial for supporting AI functionalities in different applications.
• Deployed solutions on **AWS**, utilizing cloud services to enable scalable operations and robust data management in an AI-driven ecosystem.
• Carried out thorough performance testing using tools like Apache JMeter and Locust, ensuring the reliability and efficiency of applications under realistic workloads.
• Replaced legacy systems with modern **Python** microservices to enhance the architecture of applications and improve overall performance, focusing on transition strategies for optimized workflows.
• Collaborated in cross-functional teams to align system designs with industry standards and business objectives, driving the adoption of **AI technologies** within the organization.
